name: @rsthn/xui
description: UI Toolkit to build web based tools.

scripts.requirements: yarn global add shx parcel less
scripts.clean-css: shx mkdir -p dist && shx rm -f dist/*.css && shx rm -f dist/*.png
scripts.clean-js: shx mkdir -p dist && shx rm -f dist/*.js
scripts.build-css: yarn clean-css && parcel build less/index.less --target css --public-url ./ --no-source-maps --no-cache
scripts.build-js: yarn clean-js && parcel build src/index.js --target browser --public-url ./ --no-source-maps --no-cache
scripts.build: yarn tsdoc && yarn build-css && yarn build-js

author: RedStar Technologies
